plot: Have you ever loved someone so much that you would be willing to do anything for them. Witness the comic start and the dramatic end of one couple's true love.
title: The Final Gift
plot_es: Have you ever loved someone so much that you would be willing to do anything for them. Witness the comic start and the dramatic end of one couple's true love.
plot_en: Have you ever loved someone so much that you would be willing to do anything for them. Witness the comic start and the dramatic end of one couple's true love.
